TypeSignature.Value: public delegate TOutput Converter<in TInput,out TOutput>(TInput input);
.class public auto ansi sealed Converter`2<- TInput, + TOutput> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function Converter(Of In TInput, Out TOutput)(input As TInput) As TOutput
generic <typename TInput, typename TOutput> public delegate TOutput Converter(TInput input);

span.span: The type of object that is to be converted.

typeparam.name: TOutput
typeparam.span: 要将输入对象转换到的类型。

span.span: The type the input object is to be converted to.

summary.span: 表示将对象从一种类型转换为另一种类型的方法。

span.span: Represents a method that converts an object from one type to another type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过使用此委托方法类和方法类将从一种类型的集合的每个元素转换为另一个。This delegate is used by the method of the class and the method of the class to convert each element of the collection from one type to another. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个示例演示委托以及方法类，并且第二个示例演示与该委托方法泛型类。The first demonstrates the delegate with the method of the class, and the second demonstrates the delegate with the method of the generic class. 示例 1Example 1 下面的代码示例定义一个名为方法`PointFToPoint`，用于将转换结构结构。The following code example defines a method named `PointFToPoint` that converts a structure to a structure. 然后，示例创建的数组结构，创建`Converter`委托 (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)`在 Visual Basic 中) 来表示`PointFToPoint`方法，并将传递到委托方法。The example then creates an array of structures, creates a `Converter` delegate (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` in Visual Basic) to represent the `PointFToPoint` method, and passes the delegate to the method. 方法将传递到输入列表的每个元素`PointFToPoint`方法并将转换后的元素放入一个新的列表结构。The method passes each element of the input list to the `PointFToPoint` method and puts the converted elements into a new list of structures. 显示这两个列表。Both lists are displayed. [!code-cpp[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/vb/source.vb#1)] 示例 2Example 2 下面的代码示例定义一个名为方法`PointFToPoint`，用于将转换结构结构。The following code example defines a method named `PointFToPoint` that converts a structure to a structure. 然后，示例创建的结构，创建`Converter\`委托 (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)`在 Visual Basic 中) 来表示`PointFToPoint`方法，并将传递到委托方法。The example then creates a of structures, creates a `Converter\` delegate (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` in Visual Basic) to represent the `PointFToPoint` method, and passes the delegate to the method. 方法将传递到输入列表的每个元素`PointFToPoint`方法并将转换后的元素放入一个新的列表结构。The method passes each element of the input list to the `PointFToPoint` method and puts the converted elements into a new list of structures. 显示这两个列表。Both lists are displayed. [!code-cpp[List\`1_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_ConvertAll/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[List\`1_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_ConvertAll/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[List\`1_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_ConvertAll/vb/source.vb#1)]
